title: Gaze-Guided Retrieval using CLIP
summary: Eye-gaze driven image retrieval leveraging CLIP (ViT-B/32) with an interactive Gradio interface.

title: Sentiment Analysis (YouTube Comments)
summary: End-to-end sentiment classification using BERT with a Flask API, containerized with Docker, and deployed with CI/CD.

title: Glaucoma Detection
summary: Detection of glaucoma from retinal fundus images using region growing and SVM (ICCSP 2020).
